source.query:
SELECT 
    a.id,
    a.item_total,
    a.total,
    CASE
        WHEN a.state='delivery' THEN 'delivered'
        WHEN a.state='picking_and_staging_in_progress' THEN 'pending'
        WHEN a.state='payment' THEN 'pending'
        WHEN a.state='complete' THEN 'completed'
        WHEN a.state='confirm' THEN 'pending'
--         WHEN a.state='cart' THEN 'pending'
        WHEN a.state='canceled' THEN 'customer_cancelled'
    END AS status,
    a.user_id,
    a.completed_at,
    a.bill_address_id,
    a.ship_address_id,
    a.payment_total,
    a.created_at,
    a.updated_at,
    a.currency,
    a.item_count,
    a.canceled_at as cancelled_at,
    a.canceler_id as cancelled_by,
	CASE WHEN a.delivery_method='home_delivery' THEN 1
	WHEN a.delivery_method='store_pick_up' THEN 2
	ELSE NULL END as delivery_option_id,
    COALESCE(e.country_id,'1') as country_id,
    sp_max.payment_method_id as payment_option_id,
	e.city,
    1 as language_id
FROM spree_orders a
LEFT JOIN spree_shipping_methods b ON b.name = a.delivery_method
LEFT JOIN spree_fulfilments c ON c.order_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN spree_user_addresses d ON d.user_id = a.user_id AND d.default = 'true'
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses e ON e.id = d.address_id 								
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
    SELECT *
    FROM spree_payments sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_payment_methods spm ON spm.id = sp.payment_method_id
    WHERE sp.order_id = a.id
	 AND (
		 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spree_payments WHERE order_id = a.id) <= 1 OR
		spm.type NOT IN ('Spree::Gateway::LoyaltyPoint', 'Spree::PaymentMethod::StoreCredit')
	 )
    ORDER BY sp.created_at DESC 
    LIMIT 1
) sp_max ON true
where a.state != 'cart'
order by a.id;
